New Records: Suryakumar Yadav hit 112 runs off 51 balls, his third T20I century in only 43 innings
Key Match Events: Rahul Tripathi scored 35 off 16 balls, setting a blazing start for India
Sri Lanka lost wickets too often to challenge India
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets to bowl Sri Lanka out in 16.4 overs
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-match insights provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's unbeaten streak in T20I bilaterals at home is now 11 series, with only one draw
Others: Sri Lanka's Kusal Mendis scored 21 off 10 before being caught by Axar Patel
Pathum Nissanka and Avishka Fernando were also dismissed during the match
